TopicTitle: how to go about modifying a jet engine's efficiency?

Articles.Content: I've made some shrunken engines that consume fuel a good deal faster than I'd like, and I can't really make sense of the engine modules. I've come here in the hopes someone who understands them can tell me their secrets.

you'll find pretty good explanations here

What you want is to increase the bold number below

[COLOR=#417394]atmosphereCurve       
 {
            key = 0 [B]9600[/B] 0 0
  }[/COLOR]
